contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox dam | name = La Grande-3 Generating Station | image = | caption = | official_name = La Grande-3 | crosses = [[La Grande River]] | locale = [[Baie-James]], [[Quebec]], [[Canada]] | type = | length = | height = | hydraulic_head = {{Convert|79.2|m|ft|abbr=on}} | width = | spillway_type = | spillway_capacity = {{Convert|10000|m3/s|ft3/s|abbr=on}} | began = | open = 1984 | closed = | cost = | owner = [[Hydro-Québec]] | maint = | reservoir = La Grande-3 Reservoir | reservoir_capacity = | reservoir_catchment= | reservoir_surface = {{Convert|2420|km2|mi2|0|abbr=on}} | depth = | plant_owner = | plant_operator = | turbines = 12 × 201.5 [[Megawatt|MW]] ([[Francis turbine]]) | installed_capacity = 2,418 [[Megawatt|MW]] | max_capacity = | annual_generation = | pumped_storage = | com = | decom = | bridge_carries = | bridge_width = | bridge_clearance = | bridge_traffic = | bridge_toll = | bridge_id = | map_cue = | map_image = | map_text = | location_map = | location_map_text = | lat_d = 53 | lat_m = 43 | lat_s = 47 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 75 | long_m = 58 | long_s = 06 | long_EW = W | coordinates_type = type:landmark | coordinates_display= inline,title | website = | extra = <small>Hydro-Québec, The La Grande Complex visitor booklet, 2004, ISBN 2-550-41276-1</small> }} The '''La Grande-3''' or '''LG-3''' is a [[hydroelectric]] dam on the [[La Grande River]] in northern [[Quebec]], part of [[Hydro-Québec|Hydro-Québec's]] [[James Bay Project]]. The station can generate 2,418 [[Megawatt|MW]] and was commissioned in 1982-1984. It generates electricity through the [[Reservoir (water)|reservoir]] and [[dam]] system. The dam and reservoir both are named ''La Grande-3''. {{clear}} == See also == * [[List of power stations in Canada]] * [[Reservoirs and dams in Canada]] == External links == * [http://www.hydroquebec.com/visit/virtual_visit/ Hydro-Québec's La Grande Complex] * [http://www.hydroquebec.com/generation/hydroelectric/la_grande/index.html La Grande System] * [http://www.hydroquebec.com/generation/hydroelectric/la_grande/la_grande_3/index.html La Grande-3] {{JamesBay}} [[Category:James Bay Project]] [[Category:Dams in Quebec]] [[Category:Dams completed in 1984]] [[Category:Dams on the La Grande River]] {{Quebec-struct-stub}} {{Canada-powerstation-stub}}
